info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 2:00AM MDT until further notice by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Lodge Creek near International Border affecting Blaine and Hill Counties. For the Lodge Creek...including International Border...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Lodge Creek near International Border. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:25 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 7.81 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 9.4 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM MDT.
